SpaceAndDot: Space and Dot at starting position is not allowed in Life Assurer Name.
length: Life Assurer Name length between 1 to 50.
Selfselection: For self selection LA name = to Proposer so gender , age and name shoould be same.
NumericValue: Please enter only numeric value without 'Dot'
zeroToFiftyfive: Age should be in between 0 to 55
zeroToSixtyfive: Age should be in between 0 to 65
eighteenToSixtyfive: Age should be in between 18 to 65
sixToSixtyfive: Age should be in between 6 to 65
oneToSixtyfive: Age should be in between 1 to 65
